property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ A creature equipped with this gets "speed attacker". ■ Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon, put it. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Dragsolution: Whenever you put a Dragon during your turn, if it's not the first Dragon you put this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.value: Forbidden Impulse

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This impulse starts the game in the battle zone with 6 seals on it. ■ This impulse can't leave the battle zone. ■ Forbidden Liberate: When this impulse has no seals on it, flip it to its creature side. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Rules

This creature and that creature battle.
